name: javascript racer3
tagline: Racer game implemented in javascript with a ruby/sinatra backend
body:
### Game:
Two people can play this racing game.

### App structure:
* OO JS front-end
* Ruby/Sinatra backend

### Key gems used:
* Sinatra
* PostgreSQL
* Shotgun

Author: Uzma Rahman
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
